channel.title: Embedded engineering teams for fast-moving startups. on TrustD Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Embedded engineering teams for fast-moving startups. on TrustD Solutions

item.title: Infrastructure as Code
item.description: Terraform, Pulumi, CloudFormation — we codify your entire cloud so infrastructure is versioned, repeatable, and auditable.

item.title: CI/CD Pipelines
item.description: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, CircleCI — automated testing, security scanning, and zero-downtime deployments.

item.title: Monitoring & Observability
item.description: Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana, Sentry — full-stack visibility from code to cloud.

item.title: Kubernetes & Containers
item.description: EKS, GKE, AKS — we design, deploy, and maintain scalable container orchestration platforms.

item.title: Security & Compliance
item.description: SOC 2, HIPAA, PCI-DSS — we architect and audit infrastructure to meet regulatory standards.

item.title: 24×7 Incident Response
item.description: On-call rotations, runbook automation, and post-mortems — we own production reliability so you can sleep.

item.title: Why Every Startup Needs Infrastructure as Code (Even Pre-Product)
item.description: Manual infrastructure doesn’t scale. Here’s why you should codify your cloud from day one — and how to get started.

item.title: SaaS Platform: CI/CD Overhaul & 24×7 On-Call
item.description: Redesigned CI/CD pipelines, added full-stack monitoring, and took over 24×7 on-call — cutting deploy time by 70% and incident MTTR by 60%.

item.title: Fintech Startup: Zero-Downtime Kubernetes Migration
item.description: Migrated a monolithic Ruby on Rails app to Kubernetes with zero downtime, cutting infrastructure costs by 40% and achieving SOC 2 compliance.

item.title: E-Commerce Platform: Infrastructure as Code from Scratch
item.description: Built production-ready AWS infrastructure from scratch using Terraform — launched in 4 weeks with full CI/CD and monitoring.

item.title: About
item.description:
Built by engineers, for startups.

We've spent years building, scaling, and operating platforms for startups across the US. We know what high-velocity teams need: clarity, reliability, and embedded experts who deliver from day one.

Work With Us
↓

Our Mission

We help startups build, ship, and scale — without slowing down.

TrustD makes it easy for founders and engineering leaders to get world-class DevOps and software talent that embeds directly into their teams. No red tape. No handoffs. Just engineers who get it.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Let's build something together.

Scaling your team, cleaning up your cloud, or launching your next product — TrustD's engineers are ready to help. Book a call and let's talk.

Book a Call
↓

Here's how it works.

  1. You tell us what you need.
    A DevOps engineer? A full pod?
  2. We schedule a quick intro call.
    15–30 minutes to align goals and timelines.
  3. You meet your engineers.
    Candidates ready to embed within days.

Fast, flexible, and founder-led. You'll talk directly with someone who's been in your shoes.

item.title: DevOps Placement for a Healthtech Platform
item.description: CI/CD standardization, observability, and AWS cost reductions.

item.title: Full Development Pod for a Fintech Startup
Thank You!
item.description:
Message Received

Thanks for reaching out! We’ll review your message and get back to you within 24 hours (usually much faster).

In the meantime, check out:

  • Our Services — see what we do
  • Case Studies — real projects, real results
  • Blog — DevOps insights and tutorials

Or just book a call directly — we’re here to help.
